name: Desert Bus For Hope Tycoon 2 - The Long Haul
name_original: Desert Bus For Hope Tycoon 2 - The Long Haul
description:
Desert Bus for Hope Tycoon 2 - The Long Haul is a game about running a  video stream. 

Keep the stream going however you can. Even if you gotta wear a fish on your head.

Keep your volunteers fed and happy with lots of T-Bone steaks! In return, they keep streaming and repairing the cameras and lights.

Credits

Game made by Kat Micinski and Grady Benson

Font is m6x11 by Daniel Linssen
